name: BATTLETECH - Season Pass
description:
The BATTLETECH Season Pass includes all future BATTLETECH expansions at a discounted price. In addition to all the current game content, Season Pass holders will have access to three upcoming expansions.

Flashpoint - Exciting multi-mission contracts draw you into the machinations and feuds of the Great Houses. New ‘Mechs, a new mission type, a new tropical biome and more!

Urban Warfare - Combat drops into metropolitan territory, with explosive results. Fight through urban sprawl with new ‘Mechs and mechanics.

Third Expansion - To be confirmed.
